attributes.action: Remove All Toll Charges at The Dartford Tunnel and QE2 Bridge
attributes.additional_details:
Support this petition to remove any kind of toll to use the Dartford Tunnel or QE2 Bridge.
These tolls cause traffic misery to thousands of business and private motorists everyday.
The cost of construction of the bridge has been covered, in fact enough money has been paid by motorists to fund the construction of the proposed second bridge further downstream.
